root.name: Beethoven's 2nd
root.description: OverviewBeethoven 2nd is a side scrolling game, based on the movie of the same name. Each level challenges you to rescue one of Beethoven and Missy's puppies, and is divided up into 2 stages each. In the first stage your objective is to get to the puppy while in the second, you must carry the puppy back to Missy. As Beethoven your main attack is barking, which releases supersonic waves that can devastate man or beast. Barks can be "charged" by growling, resulting in even greater destructive power. Beethoven can also shake water off of his body in order to hit enemies.

similar_games.game: The Ren & Stimpy Show: Stimpy's Invention
